product_name: Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Sac - X-Small
long_description: Use the water-resistant Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Sac in extra-small to organize toiletries, electronics cords or any of those smaller items that usually get lost inside your larger travel bag. Laminated mesh construction helps keep leaks from getting out. Clips to any loop or strap inside your luggage or messenger bag. Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Sac in extra-small measures 7.5 in. x 3.5 in. Washable.
short_description: Use the water-resistant Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Sac in extra-small to organize toiletries, electronics cords or any of those smaller items that usually get lost inside your larger travel bag.
